post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Thanks eskimo!

Buttons are a good idea, but the problem is that other Doom3 sites fear to loose hits by linking us.

There are only very few sitest who currently link to Doom3world.

It's been much more, but a few people, traceable back to come from a certain corner of the web, made sure to email every webmaster in the world to ensure that a link to Doom3world.org get's removed.

I'm currently doing a lot of backoffice work for D3W - when I'm done our external link rating will be much better again.

And - Google doesn't really like phpBB urls, there are mods which rewrite the output url's for Google, but it's not worth the hassle.

Still we're listed on dmoz which is always a good thing:
http://dmoz.org/Games/Video_Games/Shoot ... /Doom_III/

Somebody made a nice small button one day, don't know where I have it...

Everybody:
feel free to have fun with our logo and make something cool with it, even better - something funny.
